# Phren - Batch File Renamer

Tool for batch renaming files by removing square brackets content.

## Installation

```bash
pip install renph


Usage
After installation, simply run:

phren



The program will:

Show welcome message

Ask for language selection (English/Russian)

Ask for directory path

Show preview of changes

Ask for confirmation before renaming

Perform renaming operation



Features
Works on Windows 7 and Termux (Android)

Interactive interface

Shows preview before making changes

Multi-language support (English/Russian)

Preserves original filenames and extensions

Skips files if new name already exists



Examples
Before:

file 1 [abc123].txt
document [xyz789].pdf

After:

file 1.txt
document.pdf
